title: How to save my Internet data - Quora

response.answer_text: I presume you mean your mobile internet data. Streaming video on mobile is one of the biggest consumers of users data. If you use video streaming services on a regular basis, then this is eating through your monthly data allowance fast. Some streaming video players allow you to set the quality (and the data cost) of video you watch but not all video players have this feature. It is best to try and watch most of your video on wifi to preserve your mobile data. Otherwise there is an app called Datamore (which I wrote) available in the android play store, that works with all video player apps and services and on all networks. It allows users to set the data rate that any video player application is allowed to stream video at. This is one of the most effective methods of saving data, and Datamore can save up to 50% of your mobile data allowance. Datamore : Data Saver for Streaming Video - Apps on Google Play
